activities: When users access the Investopedia website, we automatically collect information such as the IP address, technical information about the computer or mobile device and other information as set forth in our Privacy Policy. Where the user of certain features requires user registration, Investopedia requires a valid email address, user name and password to create an account. Once an account is created, users may provide additional voluntary information as part of the user's account profile.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Croatia, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Data submitted online from Investopedia users
recoursemech: BBB EU Safe Harbor program dispute mechanism
